mapper.select:
select a.* from sys_user a join sys_user_depart b on b.user_id = a.id join sys_depart c on b.dep_id = c.id where a.del_flag = 0 and c.org_code like '${orgCode}%'
and a.realname like '%${realname}%'

select a.*, c.depart_name as org_code_txt from sys_user a join sys_user_depart b on b.user_id = a.id join sys_depart c on b.dep_id = c.id where a.del_flag = 0 and c.org_code like '${orgCode}%'
and a.username like '%${username}%'
and a.realname like '%${realname}%'
